about_the_game:
Chronicles of cyberpunk - Lost dream - the final part of the trilogy and the culmination of the story about the search for the real world among a series of dreams and simulations.

You will finally get to the surface and see what the real world really looks like. But is it really real? Who imprisoned you and why? Who can be trusted? There is only one way to find out.

  • this is a linear story-driven adventure in which you can reach the goal in various ways;
  • the game encourages exploration of the world, because behind every nook and cranny there can be many interesting places and its inhabitants with their own stories;
  • there are no side tasks in the game, nothing will distract you from saving the world;
  • listen to wonderful music that immerses you in the world of the game;
  • learn the culmination of the story of the protagonist and his drone Oscar.
